definitions.definition: used in questions to ask who something belongs to
used to say which person or thing you mean

examples.text: He's a man whose opinion I respect.
It's the house whose door is painted red.

definitions.definition: used to give more information about a person or thing

examples.text: Isobel, whose brother he was, had heard the joke before.

wordOrigin: Old English hwæs, genitive of hwā ‘who’ and hwæt ‘what’.
